text.autoconfig.simplestats.title: Simple Stats Config
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.stats: Toggles the entire HUD display on or off.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.paddi: Sets the distance between the stats and the edge of the screen. || default: 3
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.linep: Sets the vertical distance between each line of text. || default: 3
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.label: Label Color
Color used for labels (text before the value). || default: FF9D05
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.value: Color used for values (numbers or text after the label). || default: FFFFFF
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.showD: Enable or disable the world age display.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.dayCo: Minecraft internally starts counting days at 0. This value is added to the total to show 'Day 1' on your first day. || default: 1
Custom text to display before the day number.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.showH: Enable or disable the in-game time display.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.showC: Enable or disable the XYZ position display.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.coord: Wrap the coordinates value in brackets. Example: [123, 64, -456]
Custom text to display before the XYZ coordinates.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.showD: Enable or disable the direction the player is facing.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.direc: Choose how the facing direction is displayed.
Text shown before the direction value. Default is an arrow.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.showT: Enable or disable the counter for totems used in this world.
text.autoconfig.simplestats.option.totem: Custom text to display before the totem count.
